text: Aiden Connor O'Neill (born 4 July 1998) is an Australian soccer player. He plays for Standard Liège in the Belgian Pro League and for the Australia men's national soccer team. ==Career statistics== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League National Cup League Cup Other Total Division Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Burnley 2016–17 Premier League 3 0 1 0 1 0 — 5 0 2017–18 Premier League 0 0 — — — 0 0 2018–19 Premier League 0 0 — — 0 0 0 0 Total Total 3 0 1 0 1 0 0 0 5 0 Oldham Athletic (loan) 2016–17 League One 15 0 — — — 15 0 Fleetwood Town (loan) 2017–18 League One 21 1 3 0 1 0 2Appearances in EFL Trophy 0 27 1 Central Coast Mariners (loan) 2018–19 A-League 23 4 0 0 — — 23 4 Brisbane Roar (loan) 2019–20 A-League 17 0 1 0 — — 18 0 Melbourne City 2020–21 A-League 14 0 — — — — — — 14 0 Melbourne City 2021–22 A-League Men 21 0 2 0 — — 0 0 23 0 Melbourne City 2022–23 A-League Men 27 4 0 0 — — — — 27 4 Melbourne City Total Total 62 4 2 0 0 0 0 0 64 4 Standard Liège 2023–24 Belgian Pro League 20 1 2 0 — — — — 22 1 Career total 161 10 9 0 2 0 2 0 174 10 ==Honours== Melbourne City *A-League Premiership: 2020-21, 2021–22, 2022–23 *A-League Championship: 2020–21 Australia U23 *AFC U-23 Championship third place: 2020 Individual * PFA A-League Team of the Season: 2022–23 ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Australian men's soccer players Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Fleetwood Town F.C. players Category:Oldham Athletic A.F.C. players Category:Premier League players Category:Soccer players from Brisbane
